intent_atoms.description: CLI throughput and random slice readers must stay within budget during LargeFileBenchmarkTests
Release managers should use the archived benchmark summary as baseline evidence packet for release readiness
LargeFileBenchmarkTests must pass when run under CI defaults and with ISOINSPECTOR_BENCHMENT_INTENSITY=local

functional_units.name: LargeFileBenchmarkTests
functional_units.description: CLI throughput and random slice reader performance tests for large files

functional_units.name: ISOINSPECTOR_BENCHMARK_INTENSITY local benchmark run
functional_units.description: Local intensity benchmark execution of LargeFileBenchmarkTests with increased load

functional_units.name: Documentation/Performance/2025-10-19-benchmark-summary.md
functional_units.description: Human-readable summary of benchmark results and logs

functional_units.name: Documentation/ISOInspector.docc/Guides/ReleaseReadinessRunbook.md link to benchmark archive
functional_units.description: Reference for release managers to baseline evidence packet

functional_units.name: Summary_of_Work.md task-specific summary
functional_units.description: Task outcome captured in a summary file
